How were the biparatopic nanobodies engi: By genetically linking two nanobodies with a flexible Gly-Ser linker
By fusing them with Fc-moieties for increased half-life
By attaching them to albumin-binding motifs
By incorporating additional disulfide bonds for stability

The N-terminal domain of the spike protein
